content:
# Factorio Report

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Array at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with iron ore inserted
- Stone furnace (position x1) with coal inserted
- Stone furnace (position x2) with coal inserted

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting items into furnaces
- Ensure that the furnace is available for insertion before attempting to insert items. Check if the furnace is already processing or has no available slots.

### Errors when extracting items from furnaces
- Make sure to extract items only when the furnace has finished processing. Attempting to extract items prematurely may lead to inventory issues.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting to place it. Check for any existing entities that may block placement.
